page.title: 19Gallows Corner Area
page.content: Broadford JM&I school surveyed the area bisected by two main trunk roads ,the A12 to Chelmsford and the A127 to Southend. The area is predominantly residential with a large section of light industry in the Ashton Road area Smithe and Nephew Pharmaceuticals is the biggest single industry but also are Havering Technical offices and the LEB central depot. To the East of the A12 is the Bryant Avenue area. There is a large area of warehousing as well as houses. The predominant feature in the area is the Gallows Corner roundabout with a flyover to allow easy flow of traffic for London and Southend bound traffic. However it doesn't appear to work and frequent tailbacks occur.(See Photo)
